en.title: UX Designer
en.description: Contributed to designing intuitive and user-friendly web application interfaces, creating engaging and seamless user experiences. Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to ensure designs aligned with business goals and user needs.

list.title: Key Responsibilities
items: Conducted user research to gather insights and inform design decisions.
Created wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs using Figma.
Collaborated with developers to ensure design feasibility and implementation.
Conducted usability testing to validate designs and gather feedback.

en.title: Senior UI/UX Designer
en.description: Led the design of innovative user interfaces and experiences for Adobe's flagship products, focusing on data-driven design principles. Collaborated with product managers and engineers to create intuitive and visually appealing designs that enhance user engagement and satisfaction.

list.title: Key Responsibilities:
items: Developed high-fidelity prototypes and wireframes using Figma and Adobe XD.
Conducted user testing and research to inform design decisions.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure design consistency and quality.
Mentored junior designers in best practices and design methodologies.

en.title: UX Design Full-Time Professor
en.description: Taught advanced UX design principles and practices to undergraduate and graduate students, focusing on real-world applications and industry standards. Developed course materials and assignments that challenged students to think critically and creatively about user experience design.

list.title: Key Responsibilities:
items: Designed and delivered lectures on UX design methodologies.
Supervised student projects and provided constructive feedback.
Collaborated with industry professionals to keep course content relevant.
Mentored students in their career development and design portfolios.

en.title: Project Manager
en.description: Overseeing the development and implementation of Agile methodologies within the organization, ensuring projects are delivered on time and within scope. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to manage risks, resources, and stakeholder expectations effectively.

list.title: Key Responsibilities:
items: Facilitated Agile ceremonies such as sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives.
Managed project timelines, budgets, and resources to ensure successful delivery.
Collaborated with product owners to prioritize and refine the product backlog.
Identified and mitigated project risks to ensure smooth execution.
